snippet: The Saints’ bounty program seems to violate an agreement on what hitting in football is even about.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Steve Macone reflects on lessons he learned about violence in football from when he played in high school; contends that the New Orleans Saints' bounty program, in which players were rewarded for injuring opponents, seems to have violated an unspoken agreement on what hitting in football is about.
lead_paragraph: The Saints’ bounty program seems to violate an agreement on what hitting in football is even about.

headline.seo: Football Hits Are Part of the Game
headline.main: What I Learned From Getting Knocked Around
